website_summaries.verdict: Interactive pen and learning set has over 200 fun lessons covering five subjects.
pros: Kids press pen onto specific areas of pages to hear Pete the Cat
Lights indicate correct or incorrect answers
Can be used with parental supervision but also functions as an independent, self-paced activity
cons: Some parents feel the content is a bit too easy or fun, and the pen can be hard for some kids to hold

customer_reviews.title: It was a great learning tool and my three year old loved it
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I would have given this activity 5 stars. It was a great learning tool and my three year old loved it. Unfortunately she only got to use it a couple of times before the answer pen stopped working. (It re gisters all answers as wrong answers now, even when you choose the correct one.) This renders the whole thing pretty useless. Unfortunately I am unable to return it as the deadline to return has passed. (I bought it at the beginning of October to use on a trip we took in November, so we didn't discover the defect until it was too late.)
customer_reviews.author: Adele

customer_reviews.title: Not smart at all
customer_reviews.text: I had to talk down to my 3 year old to use this. It is such a disappointment! The questions were ridiculous and do not foster learning. I have nothing positive to say about Hot Dots Jr. If the item was smart and could "read" to the kids to let them know why a selection was wrong that would be better. The way it's designed, it can falsely indicate that the child gave the wrong answer when they did not and it lets them think they answered correctly when they have only partially answered. Crap!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for her
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 year old loves pete the cat and we wanted to get her something that was a little more involved than just books. This is perfect for her. She loves doing the different activity cards. WE also like that it involves her favorite book character with something educational. She has always been advanced for her age and we have trouble finding things that challenge her but that are still doable and this was the perfect solution for us. She likes that she feels independent doing it (we still have to read her the directions on the cards). We will probably look into getting more hot dot products for her in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G.

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Responses
customer_reviews.text: My three year old was very excited to see Pete the Cat under the tree. This product soon became a point of frustration because it would indicate a wrong answer when he was correct. The batteries are new. When I tried using the pen, I continued to get inconsistent results. I am a teacher and I do not feel that this is a reliable tool for teaching skills as it gives mixed/inaccurate responses.
customer_reviews.author: rakow

customer_reviews.title: pete the cat and hot dots: a "groovy" combination ;)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my mom who is a pre-k teacher and she loved it! she has used the hot dots in previous grades/classes so she was already familiar with how it works. for review purposes I asked how simple it was and she stated it was easy to use even if you are not familiar with hot dots and that she thought it would be fun for kids prior to starting pre-k, too. if you don't know about Pete the cat, you're missing out!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charlcie Cagle

customer_reviews.title: I’m not happy. I have no clue where the tip of ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, this might be the first toy that’s broken in our household!! I’m not happy. I have no clue where the tip of the pen vanished to and now it’s just a rubbery soft rubber like spaghetti sticking out in front of the pen :( :( :( Initially I thought. Fine. The books don’t work well ( they often give wrong answers) But atleast the younger kid like the sounds it make. But, now it’s just not working at all! I’m not sure if this is returnable if the box is not in good shape? :(
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Pen stopped working in 1 month
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old got a Hot Dots book set as a gift for Xmas and loved it but wanted Pete the Cat. I saw this, ordered it, and he was so excited. But within a few weeks (and only using it a few times) the pen stopped working. It always said the answer was wrong, even when it was correct. My son got frustrated and we just stopped using it. By the time I thought about returning it, the refund window had passed. So disappointed because we barely got to use it.
customer_reviews.author: lulu

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Preschool version for my daughter who just turned 5 and started Kindergarten. She was super excited to try it out and we went through the two books in one sitting. I thought that would be the end of it but she still enjoys playing with the books on her own. She likes Pete the Cat pen and the two different sounds it makes. I went ahead and purchased a few of the other Hot Dots materials but I really like this one because it's a book style and it's easier to take on the go compared to flash cards. I plan on buying the Kindergarten version soon.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Flower

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Preschool Learning Tool
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing learning tool. My great nephew fell in love with Pete The Cat books so this was a perfect tool to practice preschool and kindergarten skills. It does need adult assistance to read some of the instructions but as a retired elementary teacher I feel it is a good educational toy.
customer_reviews.author: Debbers

customer_reviews.title: Fun learning tool
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited to see Pete the Cat! He is 3 and caught on pretty quick on how to use it. I saw some reviews about the pen not identifying correct answers but we’ve used it for a few days with no issues. It is a fun learning tool!
customer_reviews.author: J. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Hot Dots is a great product. Bought this for my granddaughter who will be 3 in February. She loves to play with it. She needs help from an adult or older sibling who can read, but some of the activities she can figure out for herself without reading--such as comparing shapes and/or sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Cute but probably would not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 3 year old. I expected more from the pen. Wrong answers his eyes light up red and you hear a guitar riff indicating wrong. Correct answers eyes light up green with a different riff. The sound is very low. I've seen also seen my daughter select the correct answer and the pen tell her it was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Pen is wrong occasionally
customer_reviews.text: Recieved this today and the Kids love, however the pen will say correct when the answer is actually wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Fun way to learn
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fun and interactive way for kids to learn. My daughter (4yrs) LOVES it. The one could be used with other Pete the cat items/books. So that makes it easy to purchase other books alike. Good gist idea too... Last thing, it also helps with hand/eye coordination
customer_reviews.author: FRPG12

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: You have to do all the activities with your child. It doesn't read anything, only has 2 chimes for right and wrong. Not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Kderen

customer_reviews.title: ... book is smaller then I thought but it’s kool great fit for traveling once batteries are installed 2AAA not ...
customer_reviews.text: Very Cute book is smaller then I thought but it’s kool great fit for traveling once batteries are installed 2AAA not included works great Can’t wait to use it with my lil One🎄
customer_reviews.author: Free Honeybunz

customer_reviews.title: Educational, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was very interactive and easy for my daughter to understand. I bought this for her before going into pre-k and she liked these “brain games”. Was excited for herself when she got something correct as Pete Pen cheered her on! Such a great gift for dexterity, fine motor skills & Intro to words, patterns, opposites, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Vicky B.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Very effective preschool tool.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves these books. The sounds are actually an incentive to find the correct answers. But you have to make sure the pen is in the middle of the black circle because it might register it as an incorrect answer if then pen is near the edge of the circle. But it is a great tool for extra preschool help.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye020

customer_reviews.title: FUN
customer_reviews.text: I love HOT DOTS and especially am excited about the Pete the Cat one for my 3 year old son!
customer_reviews.author: Smiles

customer_reviews.title: These are great! My Pete lover is learning a ton as ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My Pete lover is learning a ton as we prepare for Kinder! He needed some help figuring it out at first, but now he is successful on his own.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Ross

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My child loves Pete the cat. Good educational activities inside. Doesn’t get bored with it. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Feli

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and great quality.
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old who LOVES Pete the Cat loves this! Fast shipping and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisWhit03

customer_reviews.title: Love Pete the Cat, the Hot Dots pen sucks
customer_reviews.text: This was a really cute set, however, our pen stopped working within a few weeks of purchasing this item. The book and cards are useless without the pen!
customer_reviews.author: jenlil

customer_reviews.title: He does enjoy working them though.Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The child can do the works by himself. The books are very flimsy. He does enjoy working them though.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Marie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work properly
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work properly! Lights up green when the answer is wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: BC57

customer_reviews.title: Interactive learning toy
customer_reviews.text: Gift purchase, my great niece uses this interactive toy and has since added to her Pete the Cat collection.
customer_reviews.author: Meowy Mim

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my autistic grandson and he has already mastered it. Great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: It is a great educational toys
customer_reviews.text: It is a great educational toys. My sone is 4 years old and he used it. He spent hour on play with this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Hoiyin K

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Covers a nice array of topics! Great introduction to Hot Dots products. My kids love the Pete pen. Easy to use! I thought the pen aspect might be buggy or to sensitive but it's actually very forgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Sackett

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: It makes learning fun for both me and my daughter! Easy to use and I don’t have to force her to want to work.
customer_reviews.author: Quintett Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Just what we expected. My four year old enjoys ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what we expected. My four year old enjoys it and my seven year old likes to pretend to be a teacher and guide him through the books.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love him at our house
customer_reviews.text: Pete the Cat is groovy! We love him at our house. This product makes learning fun. A+++++
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kilgore

customer_reviews.title: useless for a 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Really bummed that the pen registers ALL answers as being wrong. You have to hold the pen straight up in order for it to finally recognize the correct answer... useless for a 3 year old. I also don't like that I have to read the questions to my 3 year old. I would have thought that a dot would be formatted to read the question to them. I bought this in March thinking I would give it as a birthday gift in May, but decided to wait until Christmas. Now I am stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Yoder

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the music the cat
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the dog. I don't like the music the cat plays
customer_reviews.author: M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but I was hoping for something she could ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 3YO and it requires a lot of coaching on what to do on the pictures. Not bad, but I was hoping for something she could learn and do on her own.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Son lost interest in this quite quickly. I thought it was cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Jill R.

customer_reviews.title: The only issue I have is my son needs more ...
customer_reviews.text: The only issue I have is my son needs more activities. He completed the books in one afternoon. I wish the books were more advanced
customer_reviews.author: great version of spades. It's. simple, fast, and fun.

product_meta.title: Educational Insights Hot Dots Jr. Pete The Cat - I Love Preschool Set with Interactive Pen Included, 200+ Multi-Subject Lessons, Homeschool & Preschool Readiness, Ages 3+
product_meta.description: Style:I Love PreschoolMillions of Pete the Cat fans love this cool, groovin', easy-going, rockin' cat! With 20 best-selling children's books on the market and more releasing each year, happy, fun-loving Pete has become a preschool and kindergarten sensation. Musical, light-up pen guides young learners with lights and sound effects when used with any Hot Dots card or book sets. Pen requires 2 AAA batteries, not included.
feature_bullets: Learning just got a little groovier with new Hot Dots Jr. Pete the Cat interactive learning sets
This Level 1 set provides preschoolers with 200+ fun, interactive lessons in reading, math, science, social studies, and MORE
Press Pete to an answer dot—he offers affirmative sounds and green lights for correct responses & red lights and lively tones for incorrect responses
Helps develop critical early learning skills and encourages self-paced, independent learning
Hot Dots makes the perfect activity to get ready for school! Or keep kids engaged, entertained, and learning while being at home

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars169 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
